name: Brise Paradise
description: To create a space for the worldwide crypto community in Maldives. Spend your holiday relaxing in paradise, working on collaborations, launching your products, or simply celebrating your victories with your team. Phase I: Brise Paradise Hotel opens on a Maldivian island. The hotel will be the initial step toward realizing our larger objectives in the next phase. Phase II: A Private Decentra-Island in the Maldives will open in this phase Hotel & A Decentra Island NFT | Staking | PRDS Marketplace
